post_title: FS: HOFs, superprint Sov460s, rarebacks, scraps, errors & blank backs - UPDATED
post_content:
Very low pop combos - if interested please email dm me your email address. 

Chance Blank - $13,000
Wagner Blank - $1,500
Chance Lenox - $10,000
Slagle BL350 - $6,000 (PSA 2 sold for $9,300 in May REA) 
Magee scrap - $1,200
Willis error - $2,400
[STRIKE]Cobb Sov460 - $4,500
Chance Sov460 - $2,000 - likely grade A with PSA/SGC[/STRIKE]
